oai_dc:dc.dc:title: RELIABILITY ANALYSIS OF RUBBLE-MOUND BREAKWATERS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mizumura, Kazumasa
Yamamoto, Masato
Endo, Taiji
Shiraishi, Naofumi
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: breakwater
rubble mound breakwater
breakwater reliability analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: To verify the effect of wave period on the motion of concrete blocks in rubble-mound breakwaters, simple physical models are employed and their motion is investigated by the numerical simulation. Finally, risk or reliability are calculated and the weight of concrete blocks for given physical condition is discussed by them.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 21 (1988): Proceedings of 21st Conference on Coastal Engineering, Torremolinos, Spain, 1988.; 152
